node.title: Supported platforms
node.content:
Supported operating systems, JRE/JDKs, and browsers for DataStax Enterprise, DataStax Studio, and DSE OpsCenter.

Requirement for Uniform Clusters

All Nodes in each Cluster must be uniformly licensed to use the same Subscription. For example, if a Cluster contains 5 Nodes, all 5 Nodes within that Cluster must be either DataStax Basic, or all 5 Nodes must be DataStax Enterprise. Mixing different Subscriptions within a Cluster is not permitted. “Cluster” means a collection of Nodes running the Software which communicate with one another via Gossip, and “Gossip” means the mechanism within the Software enabling related Nodes to communicate with one another. For more information, see Enterprise Terms.

Supported platforms for DataStax Enterprise 6.0, 5.1, and 5.0

Amazon Linux Amazon Linux AMI 2016.09 and 2017.03. Note: Starting with OpsCenter 6.1.3, LCM automatically performs an OS supported platform check for the version of DSE being installed.

JREs and JDKs supported by DataStax products

DSE 6.0 Oracle Java 8 (at least 1.8.0_151) OpenJDK 8 DSE 5.1, 5.0 Oracle Java 8 (at least 1.8.0_40) OpenJDK 8 DSE 4.8, 4.7 Oracle Java 7 (at least 1.7.0_25)
Oracle Java 8 (at least 1.8.0_40) OpenJDK 7 OpsCenter 6.5, 6.1, 6.0 Oracle Java 8 (JDK or JRE) OpenJDK 8 Studio 6.0 (Linux) Oracle Java 8 (at least 1.8.0_151) OpenJDK 8 Studio 2.0 (Linux) Oracle Java 8 (at least 1.8.0_40) OpenJDK 8 Studio 2.0 (Windows 7 and 10) Oracle Java 8 Studio 1.0 Oracle Java 8

* The latest build of the supported Oracle JRE or JDK 8 version is recommended.

Supported browsers for DSE OpsCenter and DataStax Studio

Apple Safari Yes Mac OS X 10.11, 10.12, 10.13 Google Chrome Yes Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, 16.04 LTS
Mac OS X 10.11,10.12, 10.13
Windows 7, 10
CentOS 7 Internet Explorer No No Microsoft Edge No No Mozilla Firefox Yes Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, 16.04 LTS
Mac OS X 10.11, 10.12, 10.13
Windows 7, 10
CentOS 6.8, 7

** DataStax Studio is tested on the listed platforms (all 64-bit) with the latest versions of the specified web browsers.

Supported platforms for DataStax Enterprise 4.6.x (EOSL) to 4.8.x (EOL)

Debian Debian 6.x-7.1 x86 Dev only Debian 6.x-7.1 x86_64 Full CentOS CentOs 7.3 x86_64 Full (4.8.12 and later) CentOs 7.2 x86_64 Full (4.8.9 and later) CentOS 7.1 x86_64 Full (4.8.4 and later) CentOS 7.0 x86 Dev only CentOS 7.0 x86_64 Full CentOS 6.8 x86_64 Full (4.8.12 and later) CentOS 6.7 x86_64 Full (4.8.5 and later) CentOS 5.8-6.5 x86 Dev only CentOS 5.8-6.5 x86_64 Full Mac OS X 10.6 x86, x86_64 Dev only OS X 10.5 x86, x86_64 Dev only Oracle Oracle Linux 6 x86 Dev only Oracle Linux 6 x86_64 Full Red Hat Enterprise Linux Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3 x86_64 Full (4.8.12 and later) Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2 x86_64 Full (4.8.9 and later) Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.0 x86 Dev only Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.0 x86_64 Full Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6.7 x86_64 Full (4.8.5 and later) Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5.8-6.5 x86 Dev only Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5.8-6.5 x86_64 Full SUSE Linux Enterprise Server SUSE Enterprise Linux 11.2 x86_64 Full (tarball only) SUSE Enterprise Linux 11.4 x86_64 Full (tarball only) Ubuntu Ubuntu 11.x-13.04 x86 Dev only Ubuntu 11.x-13.04 x86_64 Full Ubuntu 14.04 x86 Dev only Ubuntu 14.04 x86_64 Full

Note: DataStax products do not support big-endian systems.
